pathway_1.title: User Thinking Pathway
pathway_1.description: Master empathy-driven research to deeply understand user needs and emotions.

pathway_2.title: Design Thinking Pathway
pathway_2.description: Prototype and iterate solutions grounded in user insights.

pathway_3.title: Business Modeling Pathway
pathway_3.description: Test assumptions and design sustainable revenue models.

pathway_4.title: Agile Project Thinking Pathway
pathway_4.description: Scope, prioritize, and execute projects iteratively.
